title: Faithful
description: Leah Thompson’s life in London is everything she's supposed to want: a successful career, the best girlfriends a bottle of sauvignon blanc can buy, and a wealthy boyfriend who has just proposed. But something doesn't feel right. Is it simply a case of ‘be careful what you wish for’?Uncertain about her future, Leah looks to her past, where she finds her high school crush, Daniel Armitage, online. Daniel is one of London's most eligible bachelors. He knows what and who he wants, and he wants Leah. Leah resists Daniel’s advances as she concentrates on being the perfect fianceé. She soon finds that she should have trusted her instincts when she realizes she's been betrayed by the men and women in her life.Leah's heart has been crushed. Will she ever be able to trust again? And will Daniel be there when she is?
author: Louise Bay
